To get the patch to work basically you extract the files via 7-zip or similar software. Firstly you run the setup.exe and follow the instructions. After the installation is complete close the program. Then copy the Patch.exe and go to My computer/(c:)/program files/Sourcetec/sothink movie dvd maker, then paste the file in that folder and run it. This should make the software work. Hope this helps.
